title: PCB Mount Solid State Relay 12V
blurb:
Low profile PCB mounting solid state relays with LED input status indication. Suitable for applications such as I/O interfaces and programmable logic controllers.
Control voltage range:9.6 - 14.4VDC
Max. input current: 20mA
Load voltage: 3 - 125VDC
Load current: 0.01 - 2A
Four types available:
SY-4092: PCB Mount Solid State Relay 5V
SY-4093: PCB Mount Solid State Relay 12V
SY-4096: PCB Mount Solid State Relay 12V Zero Crossing Turn On
SY-4097: PCB Mount Solid State Relay 12V Random Turn On
